summary: With this mod you can REALLY fly in the sky of Skyrim with 42 Mounts (version 4.2 SKSE-Dawnguard-Dragonborn) or 23 Mounts (version 2.3 SKSE- NO DLC)
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ff0000][size=6]Fully Flying Mounts[/size][/color][/b] [color=#00ff00]Version 4.2 ([url=http://skse.silverlock.org/] Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) [/url] + DLCs Dawnguard/Dragonborn)[/color] and [color=#00ff00]Version 2.3 ( [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/] Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) [/url] - NO DLC) [/color]

[color=#00ff00]Optional File: Esp version Française pour la version 4.2 [/color]

[color=#ff0000][b]IMPORTANT:[/b] you have an improved version of this mod (DLCs version only) here[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77683?] Creatures House [/url] ([b]You must remove Fully Flying Mounts before installing this one[/b])

[img]https://i.imgur.com/8VRuljQ.gif[/img]

With this mod you can REALLY fly in the sky of Skyrim with [color=#ff0000][b]42 Mounts [/b][/color]([color=#00ff00]Version 4.2[/color]): [i]Magic Anomaly, Flame, Stormy, Paalaz, Pazuzu, Fire, Mjöllnir, Azraël, Nerthus, Dwarven Eyebot, Dwarven Droid, Dwarven Empress, Dwarven Sweeper, Bone Fire Dragon, Bone Frost Dragon, Death Dragon, Red Dragon, Swamp Dragon[/i], Snow Dragon, Gold Dragon, Naga Dragon, Green Atronach, Spectrum, Bone Storm, Ash Guardian, Ahzidal, Dukaan, [i]Seeker, Netch[/i], Flying Shoggoth, [i]Spectral Dragon[/i], Soul Wisp, Skeleton Mistman, Flame Queen, Flame Storm, Flesh Spirit, Storm Spirit, Flame Spirit, Frost Spirit, Frost Anomaly, Spectral Fire Dragon, Spectral Storm Dragon

OR

With this mod you can REALLY fly in the sky of Skyrim with [color=#ff0000][b]23 Mounts [/b][/color]([color=#00ff00]Version 2.3[/color]):[i] Magic Anomaly, Flame, Stormy, Paalaz, Pazuzu, Fire, Mjöllnir, Azraël, Nerthus, Dwarven Eyebot, Dwarven Droid, Dwarven Empress, Dwarven Sweeper, Bone Fire Dragon, Bone Frost Dragon, Death Dragon, Red Dragon, Swamp Dragon[/i], Snow Dragon, Gold Dragon, Naga Dragon, Green Atronach, Spectrum


The [i]21[/i]([i]or 18[/i]) Flyable Mounts are in or near the Western Watchtower (Whiterun)

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=5325902611.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/5325902611.jpg[/img][/url]

[b][color=#ff0000]CONTROLS[/color][/b]

[color=#ff0000]UP[/color]: [color=#00ff00] Left Shift[/color]

[color=#ff0000]DOWN[/color]: [color=#00ff00] Left Ctrl[/color]

[color=#ff0000]DOWN to the ground quickly[/color]: [color=#00ff00] E or Space[/color]

[color=#00ff00] W[/color] (or Z): [color=#ff0000]forward[/color]

[color=#00ff00] S[/color]: [color=#ff0000]backward[/color]

[color=#00ff00] A[/color] (or Q): [color=#ff0000]turn left[/color]

[color=#00ff00] D[/color]: [color=#ff0000]turn right[/color]


When flying press [color=#ff0000]F12 [/color] to reconfigure the Keys (...a little problem: it is the default screenshot button on Steam ! You can go into Steam and disabled screenshots)

[color=#ff0000]ATTENTION: You MUST mount the Summoned Creature, dismount and re-mount again before flying ![/color]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=9727296518.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/9727296518.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=746738WithRavensandCo.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/746738WithRavensandCo.jpg[/img][/url]

[b][color=#ff0000]SUMMONABLE MOUNTS[/color][/b]

You must place this .esp at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game to obtain the 25 (or 6) books...(Normally, this is done automatically)

To have the [b][color=#00ff00]24 ([i]or 5[/i]) Summonable Mounts [/color][/b]([i]Snow Dragon, Gold Dragon, Naga Dragon, Green Atronach, Spectrum[/i], Bone Storm, Ash Guardian, Ahzidal, Dukaan, Seeker, Netch, Flying Shoggoth, Spectral Dragon, Soul Wisp, Skeleton Mistman, Flame Queen, Flame Storm, Flesh Spirit, Storm Spirit, Flame Spirit, Frost Spirit, Frost Anomaly, Spectral Fire Dragon, Spectral Storm Dragon), you must buy the “Spell tome: Summon XXXX”, at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace in Solitude).

With the books, you have the spells (Duration of the summon: 60 min.)...

[color=#00ff00]ATTENTION: You MUST mount the Summoned Creature, dismount and re-mount again before flying ![/color]

You can easily DISMISS when you want ! with an other "Spell tome: Dismiss Summoned Flying Mount"

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=882913539.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/882913539.jpg[/img][/url]

[b][color=#ff0000]CREDITS[/color][/b]

Thanks to NoxyGame and DOSMaster for the script of the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29860/?] Pegasus MLP fully flyable [/url] “feel free to use/enhance the script/nif/mod, but give credits to the authors”

Thanks to Vicn for the meshes of Dwarven Eyebot, Dwarven Droid, Dwarven Empress, Dwarven Sweeper, Bone Storm, Flying Shoggoth, Flame Queen, Flame Storm, Flesh Spirit, Storm Spirit, Flame Spirit, Frost Spirit, Frost Anomaly, in his mod [url=http://naaaaikikvicnvicn.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-36.html] Vicn Creature Resource [/url](”You can use any parts of this mod without my permission.”)

Thanks to Dogtown1 for the meshes/textures of Paalaz and Azraël in his [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=432877090 ] Skymomod [/url]

For the Mini Dragons: all the bone, naga, and other dragon models that are rigged to the Ice Wraith skeleton were created and rigged by Dogtown1 in the Skyrim Monster Mod .The textures are from lifestorok in his Skyrim Immersive Creatures , Versions 2 and 3; and Bellyaches in Bellyaches New Dragon Species and Ohdaviing Replacer

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=9135148910.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/9135148910.jpg[/img][/url]

[b][color=#ff0000]BUGS or PROBLEMS[/color][/b]

You only have to be careful to not crash into the ground (apparently they can also burrow underground) !

With Dwarven Empress, Azraël, Nerthus, Flame Queen, Fire, Spectrum and the Mini Dragons, if your mount disappears (with impossibility to dismount): Zoom out with the scroll wheel or FAST TRAVEL

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=3877615720.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/3877615720.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=9757951221.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/9757951221.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=696189278.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/696189278.jpg[/img][/url]
